leaders.name: Austyn Eguale
leaders.title: Founder & CEO, ODIADEV
leaders.bio: Product-driven founder building ODIADEV's voice AI for Nigeria: fast TTS, dependable WhatsApp/web agents, and real deployments for business and public service.

leaders.name: Peter Ntaji
leaders.title: Chairman & Group Managing Director, CrossAI (ODIADEV)
leaders.bio: Leads CrossAI, ODIADEV's emergency response line; works with state actors to deliver escalation workflows and always-on voice assistance.

leaders.name: Benjamin Nwoye
leaders.title: Director, Commercial Strategy, ODIADEV
leaders.bio: Drives growth partnerships and enterprise adoption of voice automation.
